items.title: Check port usage
items.solution:
Check port usage:
- netstat -tulpn | grep :PORT
- lsof -i :PORT
- ss -tulpn | grep :PORT

items.title: Network troubleshooting
items.solution:
Network diagnostics:
- ping <host>: Test connectivity
- traceroute <host>: Trace route
- nslookup <domain>: DNS lookup
- curl -I <url>: HTTP headers
